# R Package `sifr`

Spatial Interpolation Functions in R

# Author

[Zehui Yin](https://zehuiyin.github.io/), [zehuiyin@gmail.com](mailto:zehuiyin@gmail.com)

# Installation

You can install `sifr` from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
if(!require(devtools)){
  install.packages("devtools")
  library(devtools)
}

devtools::install_github("zehuiyin/sifr")
```

# Example Usage

You can find a short example that demonstrates some of the core functionality of
the package here: [Vignette](https://zehuiyin.github.io/sifr/).
